General.Name: Yantai Eddie Precision Mach
General.Description: Yantai Eddie Precision Machinery Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, and sale of attachments for construction machinery and marines in China. It offers hydraulic breakers, including light-, medium-, and heavy-duty breakers; high-frequency vibration breakers; vibratory plane compactors; long and stone grab products; quick couplers; hydraulic sheers and crushers; and automatic grease pumps. The company exports its products worldwide. Yantai Eddie Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Yantai, China.
